steps.step: From your meditating horse stance, step back with the right foot into a left neutral bow facing 12:00
Execute a right step-through snapping front kick towards 12:00 and plant your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Perform a left front crossover and execute a right knife-edge side kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver (moving forward) with a right roundhouse kick planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Execute a left spinning back kick (pivoting counter-clockwise), planting your left foot forward into a left neutral bow.
Execute a left reverse side cover into a left neutral bow facing 3:00.
From your left neutral bow, execute a right step-through knife-edge side kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver with a right front snapping front kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver with a right roundhouse kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver with a right back thrusting heel kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Execute a right side cover into a right neutral bow facing 6:00.
From your right neutral bow, execute a left spinning back kick (pivoting counter-clockwise), planting your left foot forward into a left neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver with a left roundhouse kick, planting your left foot forward into a left neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver with a left snapping front kick, planting your left foot forward into a left neutral bow.
Perform a drag-step foot maneuver with a left knife-edge side kick, planting your left foot forward into a left neutral bow.
Execute a left reverse side cover into a left neutral bow facing 9:00.
From your left neutral bow, execute a right step-through roundhouse kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Execute a left spinning back kick (pivoting counter-clockwise), planting your left foot forward into a left neutral bow.
Execute a right step-through snapping front kick, planting your right foot forward into a right neutral bow.
Execute a left step-through knife-edge side kick, planting your left foot foward into a meditating horse stance facing 12:00.
From your meditating horse stance come to an attention stance. Give a brief nod of the head.
